short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lock your ticket so you won't accidently move or edit ticket. you'll also see trello card numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It helps  locking the trello cards to move into other list, also you can pin the ticket at its  position like header tickets. Also you don't need to install any other tool for trello cards number it shows up cards numbers in bold

Start locking trello tickets to avoid accidentally moving them to other places. or get  them edited. 

✔ You can  lock the ticket by clicking on lock icon while opening ticket details. 
✔ Easily unlock them by clicking on unlock icon.
✔ Lock/Unlock all cards by using toolbar button.
✔ It also helps  showing up Trello tickets numbers in bold
